name: Garden Defenders
description:
• A tower defense game inspired by plants vs zombies. The attackers will come from the right side and you have to place down defenders on 5 different lanes to stop them from reaching the left. 
  • Based on the difficulty u set, u will have 1 to 5 lives. One attacker reaching the end will result u in losing 1 life.
  • There are 4 tutorials and then 3 battles which you have to win to defeat the game.
  • So, what are you waiting for?! Set the difficulty to max and prove that u can succeed!
  • This game was made as part of a course on Udemy, teaching how to make games with the Unity Game Engine and code with C#.
